subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter scored 39 points against his former team and the Nets rallied from an 18-point third-quarter deficit to beat the Toronto Raptors, 129-127, in overtime on Friday night.
snippet: Vince Carter scored 39 points against his former team and the Nets rallied from an 18-point third-quarter deficit to beat the Toronto Raptors, 129-127, in overtime on Friday night.
